task1.title: Asking for Information
task1.prompt: Write an email to respond to Brianna.
task1.context:
Great to hear that you are going to visit Dubai! I'm sure you will have a wonderful time there. Don't worry, I'll look after your house and your pet while you are away. I just want to know the time you leave for Dubai and when you will be back. I don't have a lot of experience looking after animals, so tell me how to care for your pet. Also, are there any other household duties I am supposed to do?

Lots of love,
Brianna
task1.instructions: You should write at least 120 words. Do not include your name. Your response will be evaluated in terms of Task Fulfillment, Organization, Vocabulary and Grammar.

task1.title: Job Application Follow-up
task1.prompt: Write an email to follow up on your job application.
task1.context:
Dear Candidate,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Manager position at our company. We have received your application and are currently reviewing all submissions. Due to the high volume of applications, the selection process may take longer than initially expected.

We will contact shortlisted candidates within the next two weeks. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

Best regards,
HR Department
task1.instructions: Write a professional follow-up email. You should write at least 120 words. Do not include your name.

task1.title: Travel Inquiry
task1.prompt: Write an email to inquire about travel arrangements.
task1.context:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well. I am planning a trip to your city next month and would like to know more about the travel packages you offer. I am particularly interested in cultural tours and local experiences.

I would appreciate any information you can provide.

Thank you,
Tour Inquiry
task1.instructions: You should write at least 120 words. Do not include your name.

task1.title: Course Registration
task1.prompt: Write an email about course registration issues.
task1.context:
Dear Student,

We have noticed that you have not completed your course registration for the upcoming semester. The deadline is approaching soon. Please contact us to resolve any issues you may have with the registration process.

Best regards,
Registrar's Office
task1.instructions: Write a response explaining your situation and requesting assistance.

task1.title: Event Organization
task1.prompt: Write an email about organizing a community event.
task1.context:
Hi there,

I heard you're interested in organizing a community event for the local charity. That's wonderful! I'd love to help out. Could you let me know what kind of event you're planning and what assistance you might need?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best,
Community Volunteer
task1.instructions: Respond with your event plans and how they can help.

task2.title: Online Learning vs Traditional Learning
task2.prompt: Some people believe that online learning is more effective than traditional classroom learning, while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
task2.instructions: You should write at least 250 words. Your response will be evaluated in terms of Task Fulfillment, Organization, Vocabulary and Grammar.

task2.title: Environmental Protection
task2.prompt: Many people believe that environmental protection is the responsibility of governments, while others think individuals should take action. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
task2.instructions: You should write at least 250 words. Support your arguments with relevant examples.

task2.title: Technology and Communication
task2.prompt: Technology has changed the way people communicate. Some believe this has improved relationships, while others think it has made them worse. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
task2.instructions: You should write at least 250 words. Include specific examples to support your arguments.

task2.title: Work-Life Balance
task2.prompt: Many people today struggle to maintain a healthy work-life balance. What are the causes of this problem and what solutions can you suggest?
task2.instructions: You should write at least 250 words. Provide practical solutions to the problems you identify.

task1.title: Hydroelectric Power Station
task1.prompt: The diagram below shows how electricity is generated in a hydroelectric power station. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features and make comparisons where relevant.
task1.instructions: You should write at least 150 words. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
task1.imageAlt: Diagram showing how electricity is generated in a hydroelectric power station

task1.title: Public Park Development
task1.prompt: The plans below show a public park when it first opened in 1920 and the same park today. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features and make comparisons where relevant.
task1.instructions: You should write at least 150 words. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
task1.imageAlt: Plans showing a public park in 1920 and the same park today

task1.title: Instant Noodles Manufacturing
task1.prompt: The diagram below shows how instant noodles are manufactured. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
task1.instructions: You should write at least 150 words. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

task1.title: Anthropology Graduates
task1.prompt: The chart below shows what Anthropology graduates from one university did after finishing their undergraduate degree course. The table shows the salaries of the anthropologists in work after five years. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
task1.instructions: You should write at least 150 words. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

task1.title: Airport Redevelopment
task1.prompt: The plans below show the site of an airport now and how it will look after redevelopment next year. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
task1.instructions: You should write at least 150 words. You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

task1.title: Plastic Bottle Recycling
task1.prompt: The diagram below shows the process for recycling plastic bottles. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

task2.title: Music Bringing People Together
task2.prompt: Some people say that music is a good way of bringing people of different cultures and ages together. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this opinion?
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.

task2.title: Self-Employment
task2.prompt: Nowadays many people choose to be self-employed, rather than to work for a company or organisation. Why might this be the case? What could be the disadvantages of being self-employed?
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.

task2.title: Advertising Effectiveness
task2.prompt: Some people say that advertising is extremely successful at persuading us to buy things. Other people think that advertising is so common that we no longer pay attention to it. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.

task2.title: Children Achievement Message
task2.prompt: In some cultures, children are often told that they can achieve anything if they try hard enough. What are the advantages and disadvantages of giving children this message?
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.

task2.title: Advertising Impact
task2.prompt: Some people say that advertising is extremely successful at persuading us to buy things. Other people think that advertising is so common that we no longer pay attention to it. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.

task2.title: Sugar Tax
task2.prompt: Many manufactured food and drink products contain high levels of sugar, which causes many health problems. Sugary products should be made more expensive to encourage people to consume less sugar. Do you agree or disagree?
task2.instructions: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. You should write at least 250 words.
